Vocabularies

plus   더하기
equals   같다
minus   빼기
times   곱하기
multiplied by   곱하기

content_subject: Math time!! (1) - The four basic arithmetic operations
english_content_text:
4 plus 2 equals 6/

4 minus 2 equals 2/

4 times 2 equals 8/
4 multiplied by 2 equals 8/

4 divided by 2 equals 2
